department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Matt Marsden is a Chicago based freelance animator and Adjunct Professor at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago and DePaul University as well as an independent animator/filmmaker whose previous short works include: Wormroom (2009)  Boxcartoon(2006)   4 Films for Hypnotic Suggestion (2004),  Stalactite (2004),  Small Green Scratches (2001) and   12 Months in 4 Films (1999) .<br><br>
